manpage.title: _findclose

description.para: Closes specific search file descriptor, release corresponding resoures.

param_note.para: Search file descriptor from last _findfirst method call.

return.para: If successful, returns 0; otherwise, returns 1, error number is set to ENOENT, represents no matching file was found.

manpage.result: Find specified file. Name is : findcls.exe _findclose is right
